A Robot for Scanning Rooms in 3D

At Floored Inc, I built a device for taking 3D scans of interior spaces. Using a Hokuyo laser rangefinder, dSLR camera, and computer mounted on a motor-controlled tripod, I was able to create some nice point clouds (as above), linked with image data.
